title: S14 Ep81: Supernatural News/Parashare: Exorcisms & Great Balls of Fire Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Exorcisms & Great Balls of Fire Edition
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS reports the strange this week on Supernatural News & ParaShare Exorcisms & Great Balls of Fire edition!

Its a wild ride as we kick off October with bizarre exorcisms, cattle mutilations, great balls of fire from sky and spooky happenings around the world PLUS your stories in ParaShare!

Support our sponsors for great deals!

TRUE CASH from TRUECAR is something you need to check out for yourself. It has never been easier or faster to get a TRUE VALUE on your car and you can do it from the comfort of home at www.TrueCar.com

Are you playing along with Beyond the Darkness on the Podcast One/ Betonline.AG Sportsnet Challenge?! Each Week Dave and Tim are picking the winners of five NFL gam,es and playing against the hosts of different Podcast One shows! If you play aloing with Dave and Tim on BetOnline.AG, and they win the week, you qualify to be one of five winners splitting a $500 weekly prize! To sign up go to https://promotions.betonline.ag/podcastone
